content: this legal text summarizes a court case that took place in palermo the court ruled in favor of the appellant partially changing the original judgment they ordered the dissolution of a community property and the sale of a specific piece of land through auction various sums of money were also ordered to be paid to different parties involved in the case the appellant filed a partial appeal arguing that the land should be divided among the coowners instead of being sold however the court rejected the appeal and upheld the original decision the court also ordered the payment of court costs and expenses to be divided among the parties after a crossexamination the court made a final ruling in favor of ss brp sg and sr sg appealed the judgment and the court partially changed the original decision they ordered the dissolution of a community and the division of a rustic land to sg who became the exclusive owner certain sums of money were also ordered to be paid to different parties involved the judgment needs to be transcribed by the land agency and the parties are responsible for paying their respective costs the decision was made on june 6 2017 and filed in the clerks office on july 4 2017

metadata.CASE_ID: Corte appello Palermo sez. II, 04/07/2017, n.1308
